name: Watch Out Reflex Game
description:
Keep tapping the black tiles and AVOID the WHITE TILES in this addicting fast reflex game! One rule, lots of FUN!

Easy to learn, difficult to master. Share with your friends on Facebook and discover who has the fastest fingers! And don't forget to check out all three Game Modes!

Features:
- Easy to Play
- Classic Mode: race against time
- Arcade Mode: tap as much as you can
- Zen Mode: tap as much as you can in 30 seconds
- Share with friends on Facebook
- Online Leaderboards

Have fun!
